proof_script:
lemma mix_pmf_in_lotteries: assumes "p \<in> lotteries_on A" and "q \<in> lotteries_on A" and "a \<in> {0<..<1}" shows "(mix_pmf a p q) \<in> lotteries_on A"
unfolding lotteries_on_def
using assms
by (auto simp: lotteries_on_def set_pmf_mix)
